mapper.insert: insert into tb_goods ( goods_name, market_money, retail_money, goods_category_id, integral_rate, integral_number, starttime, endtime, promotion_type, promotion_content, store_id, image_url, goods_id, sort, company ) values ( #{goods_name}, #{market_money}, #{retail_money}, #{goods_category_id}, #{integral_rate}, #{integral_number}, #{starttime}, #{endtime}, #{promotion_type}, #{promotion_content}, #{store_id}, #{image_url}, #{goods_id}, #{sort}, #{company} )
mapper.select: select a.goods_id, a.goods_category_id, a.goods_name, a.image_url, a.market_money, a.retail_money, a.integral_rate, a.stock_number, a.consumption_number, a.goods_status, a.sales_status, date_format(a.starttime,'%Y-%m-%d') starttime, date_format(a.endtime,'%Y-%m-%d') endtime, a.charm_number, a.store_id, a.sort, a.promotion_type, a.promotion_content, date_format(a.createdate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createdate, a.integral_number, a.company, b.name as twoname, c.name as firstname from tb_goods a left join tb_goods_category b on a.goods_category_id=.b.goods_category_id left join tb_goods_category c on b.category_parent_id=c.goods_category_id where a.store_id=#{store_id} order by cast(a.retail_money as decimal(10,2))

select b.name as twoname, c.name as firstname, c.back_rate from tb_goods_category b left join tb_goods_category c on b.category_parent_id=c.goods_category_id where b.goods_category_id=#{goods_category_id}
select category_parent_id, goods_category_id, name from tb_goods_category where category_parent_id = '0' and store_id=#{store_id} order by sort
select goods_category_id, name from tb_goods_category where category_parent_id=#{category_parent_id} and store_id=#{store_id} order by sort
mapper.update:
update tb_goods set
goods_name = #{goods_name}, image_url = #{image_url}, retail_money = #{retail_money}, market_money = #{market_money}, integral_rate = #{integral_rate}, integral_number = #{integral_number}, stock_number = #{stock_number}, promotion_type = #{promotion_type}, promotion_content = #{promotion_content}, endtime = #{endtime}, starttime = #{starttime}, company = #{company}, sort = #{sort}, goods_id = goods_id where goods_id = #{goods_id}
